meta_description.title: How to Run Your Python Scripts? - KnowledgeHut

snippet.heading: The most basic and the easy way to run Python scripts is by using the python command. You need to open a command-line and type the word python followed by the path to your script file, like this: python first_script.py Hello World! Then you hit the ENTER button from the keyboard and that's it.
